name: BTS 7 Hex
description:
BTS 7 Hex is a very fun and exciting block match puzzle game. It is always FREE!

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag a numbered hexagon block to the cells!
• Merge numbers to get higher numbers.
• Make 7 hex which is powerful.
• It can rotate hexagon block before placing them.

BTS's Members:
• Rap Monster (Kim Namjoon; 김남준) – Leader, Rapper
• Jin (Kim Seokjin; 김석진) – Vocalist
• Suga (Min Yoongi; 민윤기) – Rapper
• J-Hope (Jung Hoseok; 정호석) – Rapper, Dancer
• Jimin (Park Jimin; 박지민) – Vocalist, Dancer
• V (Kim Taehyung; 김태형) – Vocalist
• Jungkook (Jeon Jeongguk; 전정국) – Vocalist, Rapper, Dancer

Thanks for playing!
